attributes.action: Change Nevendon Road, Wickford speed limit (currently 20mph) back to 30mph
attributes.additional_details: Nevendon is a main road with recent addition to speed humps aswell no need to be 30mph. Side streets to remain 20mph.
attributes.background: Change Nevendon Road, Wickford back to 30mph. Other roads off this main road to be left at 20mph

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local speed limits are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
